programme.title: Muertoons
programme.desc: After Gabi reads the Muertoons a spooky story, everyone is chilled to the bone except Bibi. Bibi thinks scary stories are silly and says nothing can scare her. Though Bibi may discover that she is not be as brave as she thinks she is when a mysterious creature sneaks into their home.

programme.desc: Want to achieve Harley Quinn hair without dying your precious locks? Here are two ways to do it!

programme.title: Street Monsters
programme.desc: The Film Maker is the next big thing when it comes to wildlife documentaries. There's no monster too big or too scary for him to try to film. But like every expert pushing the boundaries, there's always a challenge waiting for him just around the corner.

programme.title: Street Monsters
programme.desc: The Grown Up Monster is teaching his class of monster children. Unfortunately, one of them is being more monstrous than all the others: the Whoopee Cushion Monster. He just won't stay still!

programme.title: Zo Zo Zombie
programme.desc: It’s Isamu’s birthday, and Uncle Zombo has invited him and Zo Zo Zombie over to his house to collect his birthday present. What he didn’t mention is that he wants the boys to test out a series of “security measures” in his house.

programme.desc: Isamu is competing in a ping pong tournament when Baseball Zombie stages a hostile takeover, barging in and stealing the ping pong ball! To save the tournament, Zo Zo sets off in hot pursuit to retrieve the lost ball!

programme.title: Zo Zo Zombie
programme.desc: Zo Zo runs into the town mayor, literally, and is thrilled when his honor offers to build a new skate park! First though, the mayor wants a new haircut and so Zo Zo takes him to Barbershop Zombie.

programme.title: Zo Zo Zombie
programme.desc: Isamu and Zo Zo meet Snake Charmer Zombie, whose act is dying because his Snake Zombie won’t cooperate. Zo Zo offers his guts as a substitute snake but only succeeds in getting eaten by a jealous Snake Zombie.

programme.title: Zo Zo Zombie
programme.desc: Zo Zo encounters his favorite bird - the falcon - in the park, and his new feathered friend takes Zo Zo for a thrilling ride in the sky! But when it turns out the falcon belongs to Zombie Hunter Joe, he and Zo Zo begin a battle to the death.

programme.title: Zo Zo Zombie
programme.desc: Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie make a new friend: the airy Bellow the Cloud. When the young nimbus shows them his ability to change shapes, and to transform water into rain or snow, Isamu gets the bright idea to feed him donuts.
